about_the_game:
This DLC contains:

  • Character "Adam Stone" - The bouncer who worked in the institutions of the old city, his knuckles are always with him;
  • Character "Blaze Valentine" - The best shooter on the streets of the old city, loves weapons - a lot of weapons, a lot of weapons;
  • "Double SMG" - Double shot, double damage, double ammo consumption;
  • "Brass Knuckles" - Increased attack speed, stun with every attack;
  • 250 caps;
  • 5000 coins.
